name: Shrinky The Rabbit
description:
Shrinky the Rabbit was made for the Godot wild jam 16: Short on time,

Try to pass the crash course without running out of time.

How to play:

Up/ Spacebar - Jump
Right/Left arrows - Walk
M - Mute

You Shrink as the timer reaches 0, carrots grant you more time(you don't have to pick them all up)

Challenges:
1. Try Finishing the map in less than a minute.
2. Try Finishing the map without picking up any carrot.

The Game contains one map

Music by Juhani Junkala(https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure) Under CC0 license.
